betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oCollect the elder coins, they can all be found in the overworld.

§fEngraving the sigls of the great old ones and the outer gods onto a divine shickaxe with pyrite grants it a fraction (of a fraction of a refection of a..) of their destructive might! 
The echo of this one's creatiton is very faint, this power must have been used quite a few times. 
All i can get out of it is that it was used by Terra to mine in the deep dark during a past war, when the testificates first became aware of dimensional shards.
It must have been a dire situation for Terra to use the might of the elder ones in their mining tools.
